hero.title: Safed Injera
hero.subtitle: Premium Quality Teff Injera
hero.description: Mass production of authentic Ethiopian injera made from pure teff. Delivering quality to hotels, supermarkets, and international clients.

about.title: About Safed Injera
about.subtitle: Our Story
about.missionText: To produce and distribute the highest quality injera made from pure teff, preserving Ethiopian culinary heritage while meeting modern mass production standards.
about.qualityText: We use only pure teff flour, ensuring authentic taste and nutritional value. Our production process combines traditional methods with modern quality control.
about.heritageText: Injera is more than foodâ€”it's a symbol of Ethiopian culture. We honor this tradition while making it accessible to businesses and international markets.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Premium Quality Injera
products.pureTeffDesc: Made exclusively from pure teff flour, ensuring authentic taste and maximum nutritional benefits.
products.qualityDesc: Every batch undergoes strict quality control to meet the highest standards.
products.packagingDesc: Carefully packaged to maintain freshness and quality during distribution.
products.certificationsDesc: Meeting all local and international food safety standards.

process.title: Our Production Process
process.subtitle: From Teff to Table
process.step1Desc: We source the finest pure teff flour from trusted Ethiopian suppliers.
process.step2Desc: Traditional fermentation process ensures authentic flavor and texture.
process.step3Desc: Expert preparation using traditional techniques combined with modern equipment.
process.step4Desc: Rigorous quality checks at every stage to ensure consistency.
process.step5Desc: Professional packaging that preserves freshness and quality.
process.step6Desc: Efficient distribution network ensuring timely delivery to all clients.

distribution.title: Distribution & Services
distribution.subtitle: Mass Distribution Capabilities
distribution.massProductionDesc: Our facility is equipped to handle large-scale production to meet the demands of hotels, supermarkets, and international clients.
distribution.deliveryDesc: Reliable delivery network covering local businesses and prepared for international shipping.
distribution.packagingDesc: Custom packaging options to meet your specific business needs.
distribution.scalabilityDesc: We can scale production to match your requirements, from small orders to bulk distribution.

clients.title: Our Clients
clients.subtitle: Serving Businesses Across Ethiopia and Beyond
clients.hotelsDesc: Providing consistent quality injera for hotels and restaurants serving authentic Ethiopian cuisine.
clients.supermarketsDesc: Mass distribution to supermarkets for retail customers seeking quality injera.
clients.b2bDesc: Bulk orders for businesses requiring regular supply of high-quality injera.
clients.internationalDesc: We welcome international clients and are equipped to handle export requirements and international shipping.
